verses.verse: The Lord <WH3068> reigns; <WH4427> let the earth <WH776> rejoice; <WH1523> Let the many <WH7227> islands <WH339> be glad. <WH8055>
Clouds <WH6051> and thick <WH6205> darkness <WH6205> surround <WH5439> Him; Righteousness <WH6664> and justice <WH4941> are the foundation <WH4349> of His throne. <WH3678>
Fire <WH784> goes <WH1980> before <WH6440> Him, And burns <WH3857> up His adversaries <WH6862> round <WH5439> about. <WH5439>
His lightnings <WH1300> lit <WH215> up the world; <WH8398> The earth <WH776> saw <WH7200> and trembled. <WH9123>
The mountains <WH2022> melted <WH4549> like wax <WH1749> at the presence <WH6440> of the Lord, <WH3068> At the presence <WH6440> of the Lord <WH136> of the whole <WH3605> earth. <WH776>
The heavens <WH8064> declare <WH5046> His righteousness, <WH6664> And all <WH3605> the peoples <WH5971> have seen <WH7200> His glory. <WH9202>
Let all <WH3605> those be ashamed <WH954> who serve <WH5647> graven <WH6459> images, <WH6459> Who boast <WH1984> themselves of idols; <WH457> Worship <WH7812> Him, all <WH3605> you gods. <WH430>
Zion <WH6726> heard <WH8085> [this] and was glad, <WH8055> And the daughters <WH1323> of Judah <WH3063> have rejoiced <WH1523> Because <WH4616> of Thy judgments, <WH4941> O Lord. <WH3068>
For Thou art the Lord <WH3068> Most <WH5945> High <WH9411> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> the earth; <WH776> Thou art exalted <WH5927> far <WH3966> above <WH5921> all <WH3605> gods. <WH430>

Hate <WH8130> evil, <WH9563> you who love <WH157> the Lord, <WH3068> Who preserves <WH8104> the souls <WH5315> of His godly <WH2623> ones; <WH2623> He delivers <WH5337> them from the hand <WH3027> of the wicked. <WH7563>
Light <WH216> is sown <WH2232> [like seed] for the righteous, <WH6662> And gladness <WH8057> for the upright <WH3477> in heart. <WH3820>
Be glad <WH8055> in the Lord, <WH3068> you righteous <WH6662> ones; <WH6662> And give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to His holy <WH6944> name. <WH2143>
